tools.name: haveibeenpwned
tools.title: Have I Been Pwned
tools.description: Check if a password has been found in the Have I Been Pwned database, thus making it a compromised password.

evals.input: @password-strength I would like to know if the password 'admin1234' is a compromised password

mocks.haveibeenpwned: Warning! Your password has been found `1104983` times in online databases. Please consider using a different password.

evals.input: @password-strength what's the strength of the password 'admin1234'?

mocks.haveibeenpwned: Warning! Your password has been found `1104983` times in online databases. Please consider using a different password.
mocks.offlinetest:
Password strength score: 1
Password strength feedback warning: This is similar to a commonly used password.
Password strength suggestions: Add more words that are less common.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
